text: Mohammad Razipour () is an Iranian Football player who currently plays for Iranian football club Malavan in the Iran Pro League. ==Club career== ===Malavan=== Razipour started his career with Malavan youth levels. He promoted to first team by Nosrat Irandoost in summer 2014.http://footballist.ir/index.php/irannews/309-2014-06-04-14-37-35 He made his debut for Malavan in 2014–15 Iran Pro League against Zob Ahan as a substitute for Mohsen Yousefi.http://www.iranleague.ir/MatchDetails/6365 ==Club career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Division !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|Hazfi Cup !colspan="2"|Asia !colspan="2"|Total |- !
